Action.author: kchristidis
Action.body: Let's update the status of this one.

Action.author: jyellick
Action.body: The syntax is certainly defined, but the contents are not. This is because the needs of and encoding of some of the other components in the system are still being finalized. See https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Qg7ZEccOIsrShSHSNl4kBHOFvLYRhQ3903srJ6c_AZE/edit?ts=5835b046# for discussion.
